title: Administration
content: Administration

title: Accounts and Budget Branch
content: Accounts and Budget Branch

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 1
content: Preparation of Pay Bills of all employees of Department of Expenditure.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 2
content: Preparation of T.A. Bills (Foreign and Domestic) on tours/transfer.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 3
content: Preparation of OTA Bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 4
content: Preparation of Medical, Tuition fees and Budget Honorarium Bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 5
content: Preparation of Loans and Advances Bills like House Building Advance, Flood relief etc.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 6
content: Preparation of contingent bills of the Department of Expenditure.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 7
content: Preparation of Entertainment and Hospitality and Professional/Special Service bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 8
content: Preparation of Publication bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 9
content: Preparation of air-fare bills and their settlement.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 10
content: Preparation of LTC Advance and Final Adjustment Bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 11
content: Preparation of conveyance Bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 12
content: Disbursement of Pay and Allowances every month including daily payment of supplementary and contingent bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 13
content: Writing of Cash Book and check thereof.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 14
content: Sending of Salary to the Bank for disbursement through ECS.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 15
content: Preparation of Grants-in-aid Bills.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 16
content: Maintenance of GPF Accounts of all classes and calculation of interest accrued thereon.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 17
content: Issue of GPF statements at the close of each financial year.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 18
content: Final Payment of GPF balance to subscribers at the time of retirement.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 19
content: Transfer of GPF Accounts on transfer of officers/officials to other departments.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 20
content: Calculation of Income-Tax liability of the officers/ officials.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 21
content: Filing of Quarterly TDS returns with the Income Tax Department.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 22
content: Maintenance of Court attachment orders and payment to the courts concerned.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 23
content: Preparation of challans in respects of miscellaneous amounts deposited into the Government Account.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 24
content: Proper up-keep of all accounts/advance registers.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 25
content: Effective recoveries of various co-operative Societies & Finance Stores.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 26
content: Benevolent fund, Co-operative Stores and miscellaneous ones.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 27
content: Maintenance of Accounting of House Building/Motor Conveyance advances etc.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 28
content: Calculation of Interest on Loans and Advances granted to the officers and staff of this Department for Expenditure for the purpose of House Building, Motor Cars/Scooters/Cycles and other interest bearing advances i.e. Computers etc.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 29
content: Miscellaneous Work.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 30
content: Issue of Income-tax Certificates (Form 16 etc.)

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 31
content: Issue of Pay Certificates.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 32
content: Preparation Bills in respect of Gratuity, Commutation of Pension and Final payment of GPF.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 33
content: Calculation of payment of encashment of leave salary to retiring persons.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 34
content: Calculation of up-to-date GPF balance of officers and staff who want to withdraw or take advance from their GPF Accounts and issue of certificates in this regard.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 35
content: Tracing of old missing credits as and when pointed out by the Pay and Accounts Officer or officers and issue of certificate in this behalf.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 36
content: Budget and accounts work.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 37
content: Maintenance of appropriation registers for expenditure under different heads/sub-heads.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 38
content: Maintenance of expenditure control register.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 39
content: Preparation of annual and supplementary budget of the department.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 40
content: Periodic review of budgetary expenditure and monitoring of economy instructions.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 41
content: Preparation of budget loan to Govt. servants(including House Building Advances of the Department).

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 42
content: To attend the audit objection relating to cash section only.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 43
content: Submission of quarterly returns to the department of Expenditure.

title: Accounts and Budget Branch - Point 44
content: Reconciliation of Accounts with P.& A.O.

title: Administration - I
content: Administration - I

title: Administration - I - Point 1
content: All personal cases relating to the officers of the rank of Section Officers and above including that of Gazetted officers working against isolated posts in the Plan Finance Division, FCD, IC, Hindi Section, Pay Research Unit etc.

title: Administration - I - Point 2
content: All personal cases of all categories of Stenographers of CSSS and personal Staff of Finance Minister.

title: Administration - I - Point 3
content: Circulation of the various training programmes within the country/abroad and nomination of officers thereof

title: Administration - I - Point 4
content: Coordination work within Department of Expenditure on verification and re- verification of character and antecedents of staff under the administrative control of Admn.-I Section.

title: Administration - I - Point 5
content: Preparation of Demands in respect of Department of Expenditure and Allocation of funds for the grant of House Building and other advances.

title: Administration - I - Point 6
content: Grant of House Building Advance & Other advances to all categories of Officers/officials whose personal cases are dealt in Admn.I. Branch.

title: Administration - I - Point 7
content: Work relating to vigilance and Disciplinary cases against the officers/staff whose Personal matters are dealt in Admn.I. Branch.

title: Administration - I - Point 8
content: Internal Security arrangements in the Department of Expenditure.

title: Administration - I - Point 9
content: All matter related to CGHS.

title: Administration - I - Point 10
content: Reimbursement of medical expenses whose personal matters are dealt in Admn.I. Branch (Officers/staff and their families) under medical attendance Rules.

title: Administration - I - Point 11
content: Central Secretariat Library and Finance Library membership of officers/staff.

title: Administration - I - Point 12
content: Grant-in-aid for amenities to staff of Department of Expenditure.

title: Administration - I - Point 13
content: Work relating to Elections to Parliament/State Legislatures.

title: Administration - I - Point 14
content: Work relating to collections of donations in respect of Armed Forces Flag Day Red Cross etc.

title: Administration - I - Point 15
content: Collection and Distribution of Republic Day/Independence Day passes and other functions.

title: Administration - I - Point 16
content: Processing and preparing of pension cases and matters connected therewith of all Categories of Officers/officials whose personal cases are dealt in Ad.I. Branch.

title: Administration - I - Point 17
content: Welfare matters of employees of Department of Expenditure.

title: Administration - I - Point 18
content: Grant of honorarium to the officers/staff of the Department of Expenditure.

title: Administration - I - Point 19
content: Matter relating National Institute of Financial Management/Controller General of Accounts/CA(Cost).

title: Administration - I - Point 20
content: Matters regarding prevention of sexual harassment of women at work Place.

title: Administration - I - Point 21
content: RTI Matters relating to above subjects.

title: Administration - I - Point 22
content: Forwarding of Grievances relating to Department of Expenditure to various sections.

title: Administration - I - Point 23
content: Furnishing of Nomination for various Awards.

title: Administration - II
content: Administration - II

title: Administration - II - Point 1
content: All service matters including personal cases relating to Assistant Section Officers, SSAs and JSAs and those of Non-Gazetted officers, Gr. B Gazetted officers (SSO) working against isolated posts in the Plan Finance Division, Pay Research Unit, Hindi Section and Finance Canteen.

title: Administration - II - Point 2
content: All service matters including personal cases of Group ‘C’ staff and Staff Car Drivers/ Scooter Drivers.

title: Administration - II - Point 3
content: Framing/amendment of Recruitment Rules for posts in Staff Inspection Unit, Plan Finance Division and Pay Research Unit, Finance Commission Division, Finance Canteen, SCD etc.

title: Administration - II - Point 4
content: House Building Advance to Non-Gazetted officers under the administrative control of this branch.

title: Administration - II - Point 5
content: Periodical Returns relating to Establishment matters, concerning the Branch.

title: Administration - II - Point 6
content: Verification and Re-verification of character and antecedents of staff under the administrative control of Admn.II Section.

title: Administration - II - Point 7
content: Functioning as Cell in the Department of Expenditure in respect of reservation for Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes and physically handicapped in Services.

title: Administration - II - Point 8
content: Authorized permanent strength of JSAs, SSAs and Assistant Section Officer and review of staff strength.

title: Administration - II - Point 9
content: Sponsoring candidates for training programmes conducted by ISTM for the Non-Gazetted staff.

title: Administration - II - Point 10
content: Review of cases of Govt. servants to adjudge their fitness for continuance in service beyond the age of 50/55 years or on completion of 30 years of qualifying service in respect of the staff under the administrative control of the Branch.

title: Administration - II - Point 11
content: Processing and preparing of pension cases and matters connected therewith of staff under the administrative control of Ad.II Section.

title: Administration - II - Point 12
content: Medical claims (permission, reimbursement etc.) of staff under the administrative control of Ad.II Section.

title: Administration - II - Point 13
content: Channel of submission – updation

title: Administration - II - Point 14
content: Preparation of Induction Material

title: Administration - II - Point 15
content: Compilation/Consolidation of Orders/Instructions etc.

title: Administration - II - Point 16
content: Allocation of Business Rules – Circulation of Amendments/Additions etc.

title: Administration - II - Point 17
content: RTI Matters relating to above subjects.

title: Administration - II - Point 18
content: Management of Contractual employees i.e. OA, DEO, Worker and Driver etc.

title: Administration - II - Point 19
content: Prime Minister’s New 15 point programme for the welfare of Minorities.

title: Administration - II - Point 20
content: Annual report regarding representation of SC, ST, OBC and PWD.

title: Administration - II - Point 21
content: Matter relating to the honorarium.

title: Administration - II - Point 22
content: Management of Finance Canteen and related matters.

title: General Administration Division
content: General Administration Division

title: General Administration Division - Point 1
content: Liveries for staff car drivers and MTS employees.

title: General Administration Division - Point 2
content: Identity Cards and Temporary passes.

title: General Administration Division - Point 3
content: Maintenance of Conference Room No. 72 and Fresco Room (Room No. 169-D).

title: General Administration Division - Point 4
content: Staff Car/ Scooters-purchase, maintenance and use of staff cars.

title: General Administration Division - Point 5
content: Purchase, maintenance and issue of office equipments like Computers, Printers, Fax machines, duplicating machines, photocopiers, Calculators, ACs, Furniture items, Heaters, Briefcases, Callbells, Air Purifiers etc.

title: General Administration Division - Point 6
content: Stationery articles (a) Local Purchase (b) Issue of those items.

title: General Administration Division - Point 7
content: Printing works & Binding works.

title: General Administration Division - Point 8
content: Stamps (Rubber & others) and brass seals & name plates.

title: General Administration Division - Point 9
content: Payments of refreshment bills of official meetings.

title: General Administration Division - Point 10
content: Preparation of budget estimates, revised estimates, relating to “Office Expenses” and “IT-OE”.

title: General Administration Division - Point 11
content: Issue of "NO DEMAND" certificate

title: General Administration Division - Point 12
content: Electrical items like Fluorescent tubes, Bulbs, Table Lamps, Table fans, Emergency lights etc.

title: General Administration Division - Point 13
content: Printing of Directory of Ministry of Finance.

title: General Administration Division - Point 14
content: Payments for Book/ Periodicals / Newspapers of Reference Library.

title: General Administration Division - Point 15
content: Telephones/Inter-com installation, Disconnection and payments of bills.

title: General Administration Division - Point 16
content: Reimbursement of news-paper bills of the officers.

title: General Administration Division - Point 17
content: Swachhta Action Plan in respect of Departm

title: General Administration Division - Point 18
content: Swachhta Action Plan in respect of Department of Expenditure.

title: General Administration Division - Point 19
content: RTI Matters relating to above subjects.

title: Caretaking Cell
content: Caretaking Cell

title: Caretaking Cell - Point 1
content: Opening and closing of Rooms.

title: Caretaking Cell - Point 2
content: Cleaning of Rooms

title: Caretaking Cell - Point 3
content: Liaison with CPWD (Civil) for white washing and repair in the rooms.

title: Caretaking Cell - Point 4
content: Liaison with CPWD (Electrical).

title: Caretaking Cell - Point 5
content: Liaison with Horticulture Department for supply of foliage plants.

title: Caretaking Cell - Point 6
content: Special attention to Gate No.2, North Block and Ist Floor for cleanliness.

title: Departmental Record Room (Exp.)
content: Departmental Record Room (Exp.)

title: Departmental Record Room (Exp.) - Point 1
content: To keep old files for preservation.

title: Departmental Record Room (Exp.) - Point 2
content: To issue files to Sections for reference.

title: Departmental Record Room (Exp.) - Point 3
content: To send files due for review to Sections for review and weeding.

title: Departmental Record Room (Exp.) - Point 4
content: To get appraisal of files of more than 25 years old and transfer to National Archives of India.

title: Departmental Record Room (Exp.) - Point 5
content: To Monitor (i) report (half-yearly) on de-classification of classified records; (ii) half yearly report on Recording / Indexing / Weeding out of old files and send results to National Archives of India.

title: Departmental Record Room (Exp.) - Point 6
content: To send Annual Report on Records etc to National Archives of India.
